testsuite.name: Authentication Process
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Authentication Process As a registered member in the system I want to have access to all of its internal features, which are only accessible after a successful login procedure
--Output from -- #Issue#73 - Informar erro ao submeter username inexistente, na tela de Login Scenario: # Authentication.feature:7 Given I am at the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:44 When I try to login with an user that does not exist # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:71 Then I am redirected to the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:31 And A login failure message is displayed # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:77
--Output from -- #Issue#66 - Informar erro ao submeter usuário com senha inválida, na tela de Login Scenario: # Authentication.feature:15 Given I am at the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:44 ENTROU no signIn Enabled == true When I try to login with an existent user, though with wrong password # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:74 Then I am redirected to the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:31 And A login failure message is displayed # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:77
--Output from -- #Issue#63 - Informar quando um usuário é cadastrado com sucesso Scenario: # Authentication.feature:23 ENTROU no registerparams NULL Given I am at the User Register Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:48 user: null validate: null errors: null ENTROU no register When I register a user with success # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:85 And I am redirected to the User Register Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:34 Then A message indicating the user was successfully registered is displayed # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:88
--Output from -- #Issue#69 - Informar quando tentar cadastrar novo usuário com e-mail inválido Scenario: # Authentication.feature:31 Given The system has no user with the "invalid email abcde" email # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:80 When I try to create a "newuser" username with the "invalid email abcde" email # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:102 Then It won't save the "newuser" username with the "invalid email abcde" email # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:106
--Output from -- #Issue#67 - Durante o login, ao errar o password de um usuário existente, cuja conta ainda não foi liberada pelo #administrador, redirecionar à Tela de login e exibir uma mensagem de 'usuário ou senha inválida' Scenario: # Authentication.feature:39 Given I am at the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:44 And The user of "naoHabilitado" username is not yet enabled # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:93 ENTROU no signIn Enabled == false When I miss the password for "naoHabilitado" username # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:97 Then I am redirected to the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:31 And A login failure message is displayed # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:77
--Output from -- #Issue#86 - Duas telas diferentes de login existentes durante a navegação: uma 'oficial', acessada pelo caminho auth/login, e outra #encontrada no caminho raiz '/' da aplicação Scenario: # Authentication.feature:50 Given I am not logged # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:149 When I directly access the Member List Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:40 Then I am redirected to the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:31
--Output from -- Scenario: # Authentication.feature:55 Given I am not logged # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:149 When I access the Root Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:37 Then I am redirected to the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:31
--Output from -- #Issue#9 - Preencher com valores default campos de formulários quando relevante Scenario: # Authentication.feature:62 Given I am at the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:44 ENTROU no registerparams NULL When I click the "Create an account" link # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:61 Then I am redirected to the User Register Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:34 And The University field is filled with "Federal University of Pernambuco" # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:113
--Output from -- #Issue#76 - Usuário é direcionado para tela de login repetidas vezes Scenario: # Authentication.feature:70 ENTROU no signIn Enabled == trueENTROU NO TRYJefferson Almeida Given I am at the Member Listagem page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:52 When I select the "Principal" menu option # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:64 Then I am redirected to the Publications Menu page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:28
--Output from -- #Issue#65 - Ao tentar realizar cadastro de usuário com dado inválido o form de cadastro deve ser retornado com os #dados previamente preenchidos Scenario: # Authentication.feature:78 Given I am at the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:44 ENTROU no registerparams NULL When I click the "Create an account" link # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:61 And I am redirected to the User Register Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:34 And I mistype my password at the second password field # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:118 And I fill my remaining user data # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:123 ENTROU no register And I submit the form # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:67 Then I am redirected to the User Register Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:34 And The password fields are empty # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:131 And My remaining user data is still at their corresponding fields # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:137
